typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		CustomerID as string,
		LastName as string,
		FirstName as string,
		PhoneNumber as string,
		CreatedDate as timestamp,
		UpdatedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> SRDVDSalesCustomerRawOutput
source(output(
		AddressID as string,
		CustomerID as string,
		AddressLine1 as string,
		AddressLine2 as string,
		City as string,
		State as string,
		ZipCode as string,
		CreatedDate as timestamp 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.SSSSSSS',
		UpdatedDate as timestamp 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.SSSSSSS'
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true) ~> SRDVDSalesCustomerAddressesOutput
source(output(
		CustomerID as string,
		LastName as string,
		FirstName as string,
		PhoneNumber as string,
		CreatedDate as timestamp 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.SSSSSSS',
		UpdatedDate as timestamp 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.SSSSSSS'
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true) ~> SRStreamingCustomerRawOutput
source(output(
		AddressID as string,
		CustomerID as string,
		AddressLine1 as string,
		AddressLine2 as string,
		City as string,
		State as string,
		ZipCode as string,
		CreatedDate as timestamp 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.SSSSSSS',
		UpdatedDate as timestamp 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.SSSSSSS'
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> SRStreamingCustomerAddressRawSource
source(output(
		CustomerID as string,
		LastName as string,
		FirstName as string,
		AddressLine1 as string,
		AddressLine2 as string,
		City as string,
		State as string,
		ZipCode as string,
		PhoneNumber as string,
		CreatedDate as date 'yyyy-MM-dd',
		UpdatedDate as date 'yyyy-MM-dd'
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> FourthCoffeeCustomer
source(output(
		CustomerID as string,
		LastName as string,
		FirstName as string,
		AddressLine1 as string,
		AddressLine2 as string,
		City as string,
		State as string,
		ZipCode as string,
		PhoneNumber as string,
		CreatedDate as timestamp 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.SSSSSSS',
		UpdatedDate as timestamp 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.SSSSSSS'
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> VanArsdaleCustomer
SRDVDSalesCustomerRawOutput, SRDVDSalesCustomerAddressesOutput join(SRDVDSalesCustomerRawOutput@CustomerID == SRDVDSalesCustomerAddressesOutput@CustomerID,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinCustomertoAddy
JoinCustomertoAddy derive(sourcesystemid = "southridgedvd",
		MasterCreateDate = greatest(SRDVDSalesCustomerAddressesOutput@CreatedDate,SRDVDSalesCustomerRawOutput@CreatedDate ),
		MasterUpdateDate = greatest(SRDVDSalesCustomerRawOutput@UpdatedDate,SRDVDSalesCustomerAddressesOutput@UpdatedDate),
		GlobalCustomerID = uuid()) ~> DerivedColumnsForCustomerDim
SRStreamingCustomerRawOutput, SRStreamingCustomerAddressRawSource join(SRStreamingCustomerRawOutput@CustomerID == SRStreamingCustomerAddressRawSource@CustomerID,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinCustomerToAddyStreaming
JoinCustomerToAddyStreaming derive(sourcesystemid = "southridgestreaming",
		MasterCreateDate = greatest(SRStreamingCustomerAddressRawSource@CreatedDate, SRStreamingCustomerRawOutput@CreatedDate),
		MasterUpdateDate = greatest(SRStreamingCustomerAddressRawSource@UpdatedDate, SRStreamingCustomerRawOutput@UpdatedDate),
		GlobalCustomerID = uuid()) ~> DerivedColumnsForStreamingCustomers
DVDCustomerColSelect, StreamingCustomerColSelect, FourthCoffeeSelect, DerivedColumnVanArsdale union(byName: true)~> UnionCustomers
DerivedColumnsForCustomerDim select(mapColumn(
		CustomerID = SRDVDSalesCustomerRawOutput@CustomerID,
		LastName,
		FirstName,
		PhoneNumber,
		AddressID,
		AddressLine1,
		AddressLine2,
		City,
		State,
		ZipCode,
		sourcesystemid,
		CreatedDate = MasterCreateDate,
		UpdatedDate = MasterUpdateDate,
		GlobalCustomerID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> DVDCustomerColSelect
DerivedColumnsForStreamingCustomers select(mapColumn(
		CustomerID = SRStreamingCustomerRawOutput@CustomerID,
		LastName,
		FirstName,
		PhoneNumber,
		AddressID,
		AddressLine1,
		AddressLine2,
		City,
		State,
		ZipCode,
		sourcesystemid,
		CreatedDate = MasterCreateDate,
		UpdatedDate = MasterUpdateDate,
		GlobalCustomerID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> StreamingCustomerColSelect
FourthCoffeeCustomer derive(sourcesystemid = "FourthCoffee",
		CreatedDateToTimeStamp = toTimestamp(concat(toString(CreatedDate, 'yyyy-MM-dd')," 00:00:00.0000000"),'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.SSSSSSS'),
		UpdatedDateToTimeStamp = toTimestamp(concat(toString(UpdatedDate, 'yyyy-MM-dd')," 00:00:00.0000000"),'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.SSSSSSS'),
		GlobalCustomerID = uuid()) ~> DerivedColumnFourthCoffee
VanArsdaleCustomer derive(sourcesystemid = "VanArsdale",
		GlobalCustomerID = uuid()) ~> DerivedColumnVanArsdale
DerivedColumnFourthCoffee select(mapColumn(
		CustomerID,
		LastName,
		FirstName,
		AddressLine1,
		AddressLine2,
		City,
		State,
		ZipCode,
		PhoneNumber,
		sourcesystemid,
		CreatedDate = CreatedDateToTimeStamp,
		UpdatedDate = UpdatedDateToTimeStamp,
		GlobalCustomerID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> FourthCoffeeSelect
UnionCustomers sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['CustomerDim'],
	mapColumn(
		CustomerID,
		LastName,
		FirstName,
		PhoneNumber,
		AddressID,
		AddressLine1,
		AddressLine2,
		City,
		State,
		ZipCode,
		sourcesystemid,
		CreatedDate,
		UpdatedDate,
		GlobalCustomerID
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> WritetoCustomerDimCurated
